applications.name: Steem Scanner
applications.about: Steem Scanner is a modern and user-friendly explorer for the Steem blockchain. It is developed and managed by Blaze Apps.

applications.name: Autoblaze
applications.about: Autoblaze is an automation platform for the Steem ecosystem, offering fanbase voting, post scheduling, intelligent curation, and reward-boosting tools.

applications.name: UPEX
applications.about: UPEX is a delegation and earning service on Steem that provides one daily upvote per delegation or liquid payouts exceeding 14% APR. It also acts as a liquid rewards gateway, allowing users to receive all post and comment rewards in liquid STEEM by setting UPEX as a beneficiary.

applications.name: Hari Raid
applications.about: Hari Raid is a tap-to-earn boss raid game on the Steem blockchain where players summon random cards per battle, compete for a weekly 300 STEEM prize pool, and earn special rewards through Frenzy Mode and final blow mechanics.

applications.name: SteemDex
applications.about: SteemDex is a spot trading platform for the internal STEEM market, offering zero-fee internal trades, STEEM/SBD spot trading, and cross-chain swaps.

applications.name: World of Xpilar Bingo
applications.about: World of Xpilar Bingo brings classic bingo gameplay to the Steem blockchain, combining fair gaming mechanics with STEEM-based rewards.

applications.name: SteemWorld
applications.about: SteemWorld is a comprehensive account management and blockchain interaction platform, providing dashboards for voting, delegations, and witness management.

applications.name: H4Lab
applications.about: H4Lab is the official platform by @h4lab, providing real-time blockchain statistics, financial research tools, and advanced article search capabilities for the Steem ecosystem.
